item.title: What Do We Do with the One Life We’re Given? - Scientists, Writers, Philosophers & Changemakers Share their Stories
item.description: Paul Shrivastava, Bayo Akomolafe, Michel Forst, Guy Leschziner, Eiren Caffall, Fernando García-Moreno, Natasha Hakimi Zapata, Irvin Weathersby Jr., The Club of Rome, human experience, eco-civilization, neuroscience, creative process podcast, creative process, creativity, arts, culture, Mia Funk, Feed: https://thecreativeprocess.squarespace.com/books-writers?format=rss

item.title: Edinburgh Fringe: Hot Mess, Footballers Wives, Laura Benanti, Spy Movie The Play, Jackie!!! & Midnight at the Palace
item.description:
Join West End Frame Editor, Andrew Tomlins, for a round-up of some shows at the 2025 Edinburgh Fringe Festival. 


The shows discussed are Laura Benanti: Nobody Cares (Underbelly, Bristo Square), Spy Movie: The Play (Pleasance Courtyard), Jackie!!! (Gilded Balloon Patter House), Midnight at the Palace (Gilded Balloon Patter House), Hot Mess (Pleasance Courtyard) and Footballers Wives (Assembly Rooms).


This podcast is hosted by Andrew Tomlins... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/67979d6964a671b4e187bc94
